name: Discoverer
description: Discoverer is a game of exploration and discovery. The player must locate new lands, classify the unknown, build and defend a settlement, collect and manage resources, create objects, manipulate alchemy and minerals, master teleportation, improve the +50 available skills, avoid diseases, procure a food stock, use stealth, learn new attacks to use with the Energy Sphere, navigate the seas, draw maps and survive in a hostile environment; while searching for the Land of Energy and attempts to save the destiny of his world.
